fullText: Despite a talented cast and admirable ambitions, 'Paradise Square' is a musical that doesn't quite know what it wants to be, juggling too many themes without fully developing any of them.
dtliExcerpt: Despite a talented cast and admirable ambitions, 'Paradise Square' is a musical that doesn't quite know what it wants to be, juggling too many themes without fully developing any of them.
